title: Sniper Elite 3-FTS WORKING!!
description:
This FTS upload includes the necessary redist software that not every on has, as well as a functioning crack thanks to Klowner and Taker009, nice one guys! I also run WIN 7 64x so if this works or doesn't work for people on other windows OS please leave a comment-

Quote: Klowner at 2014-08-06 00:46 CET:
"Finally got this game working! Spent quite some time trying to figure it out:

I'm on windows 7 64x
I advise to uninstall and restart from scratch:
1, install from this http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784 the vcredist_x64.exe AND the other one (vcredist_x86.exe),
2, Install the game, but don't install the crack.
3, get the crack from page 2 on this http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/10439300/Sniper_Elite_3-FTS (I took this from Taker009, he is trusted), or just find the RELOADED crack alone
4,Copy the new crack in the directories.
5, Launch the game from inside the bin location

Worked for me! Hope this helps the ones who are struggling."
